products.title: Pocket Spring Mega Sofa
products.description: This mega sofa in gray with pocket spring core and cushions turns the living room into a relaxation room with a feel-good factor. The dimensions of approx. 276 x 145 cm (W x D) speak for themselves: you can really stretch out on the couch. The pocket spring core on a base frame offers excellent conditions for taking a break from everyday life. You also have plenty of foam-filled comfort enhancers available

products.title: Nostalgic Chesterfield Sofa
products.description: This Chesterfield sofa in gray brings a nostalgic atmosphere into your four walls. The three-seater impresses with the characteristic quilting in a diamond pattern with button details. The color scheme in elegant gray also exudes British nobility. The feet are made of solid eucalyptus wood and are painted black to match the color of the seat. Thus, they underline the luxurious vintage look

products.title: Velvet Elegant Retrieving Sofa
products.description: This sofa in pink with a velvet cover is the ideal retreat to spend moments with family and friends. The couch impresses with its chic Chesterfield design. The stylish quilting that adorns the armrests and backrests is characteristic of this. The soft polyester cover with velvet surface in dusky pink rounds off the elegant look, which looks good from every angle thanks to the real covered back.

products.title: Unique Eye Catching Sofa
products.description: This mega sofa in comes to your home with a unique eye-catching effect. This is primarily due to the striking mustard yellow color scheme. Black metal feet delicately stand out. Thanks to the real upholstered back, the furniture can also be integrated in the open furnishing style and unfolds its effect perfectly there

products.title: Landscape Nostalgic Ambience
products.description: Make yourself comfortable: this LANDSCAPE sofa creates a nostalgic ambience in your living room. The elegantly curved armrests and the antique wooden feet make the couch a tasteful piece of jewelry. The warm brown tones emphasize the stylish shape of the mega sofa. Particularly practical

products.title: Cushion And Great Comfort
products.description: This mega sofa in green with cushions offers you great comfort. With a width of approx. 300 cm, you don't just choose a favorite place: the whole couch becomes your new place to be. You will feel at home here
